description: I'm from Brasilia, Brazil. I am a software engineer graduated from the University of Brasília (UnB). Always looking for new challenges and new horizons.
descriptionAbout: I'm a calm guy, with a desire to work, a passion for programming and new knowledge and experiences. I like projects, from their initiation phase to the closing phase. Graduated in Software Engineering from the University of Brasília (UnB) with experience in Java, Java EE, Java Android, ReactJS, Python Django and MySQL, Golang, Javascript, API Rest, HTML and CSS, in addition to agile methodologies such as SCRUM and XP.
name: Victor Hugo Lopes Mota

projects.title: Grata - Management of Meetings and Minutes
projects.description: Project developed as Course Completion Work, using as Frontend ReactJs and as Backend Python Django.
